title: Transition towards net zero emissions: Integration of a PV/T system with a hydroelectric generator and the impact of demand-side management
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Armel Zambou Kenfack, Modeste Kameni Nematchoua, Elie Simo, Ghislain Junior Bangoup Ntegmi, Venant Sorel Chara-Dackou
